this_title: Bill Maher... But I'm Not Wrong
introduction: Bill Maher's ninth stand-up special airs 13 Feb on HBO.In the special, Maher's going to address whether the "Great Recession" is really over; the fake patriotism of the right wing; what goes on in the mind of a terrorist; why Obama needs a posse instead of the secret service; the drug war; Michael Jackson; getting out of Iraq and Afghanistan; racism; the Teabagger movement; religion; the healthcare fight; why Gov. Mark Sanford will come out looking good, and how silly it is to ask "Why do men cheat?"; and why comedy most definitely didn't die when George Bush left office.
foreign_title: Bill Maher... But I'm Not Wrong
